EmailTemplate.name: 01-08-21 HOS eWeekly Channel Newsletter.01-08-21 HOS eWeekly Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – Fulfillment Orders on Christmas Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly: January 08, 2021 Reminder: Fulfillment Orders on Martin Luther King, Jr. Day – January 18, 2021 Monday, January 18, 2021 is Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, a U.S. national holiday observed by NCR. All orders will be fulfilled as listed in the table below. As a reminder, the cut off time for all orders is 6:00 p.m. ET. - Next Calendar Day (NCD) service level orders are not affected by the holiday. These orders will ship the same day as ordered and will be delivered the following day via FedEx as FedEx is open on Monday, January 18, 2021. - Next Flight Out (NFO) service level orders will be available every day, including Friday, December 25th. - Next Business Day (NBD) service level orders will be fulfilled on the next business day following the holiday according to the grid below. AED Next Business Day (NBD) Fulfillment Schedule   Friday, 1-15-21 Friday, 1-15-21 Monday, 1-18-21 Monday, 1-18-21 Tuesday, 1-19-21 Wednesday, 1-20-21 Tuesday, 1-19-21 Tuesday, 1-19-21 Wednesday, 1-20-21 <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
